Students will not be charged tuition and do not need a release from their resident district if accepted for enrollment. Behavior reports for the past two years are required with each application.

We have unlimited openings for 6th–8th grades at C-A Middle School and for 9th-12th grades at C-A High School. Applications for these grades will be available on our website from June 24 – August 26.

Transportation is the responsibility of parents.

For more information call 810-591-3206.

Stay home, stay safe!
